DOC.criteria: Age ≥18 ≤35 yr Male Healthy Use medication Smoking History , sign symptoms cardiovascular disease History atrial ventricular arrhythmia ( Family ) history myocardial infarction stroke age 65 year Cardiac conduction abnormality ECG consist 2nd degree atrioventricular block complex bundle branch block Hypertension ( define RR systolic > 160 RR diastolic > 90 mmHg ) Hypotension ( define RR systolic < 100 RR diastolic < 50 mmHg ) Renal impairment ( define plasma creatinine > 120 μmol/l ) Liver enzyme abnormality alkaline phosphatase > 230 U/L and/or ALT > 90 U/L Medical history obvious disease associate immune deficiency CRP > 20 mg/L , WBC > 12x109/L , clinically significant acute illness , include infection , within 4 week endotoxemia day Participation drug trial donation blood 3 month prior experiment Preexistent lung disease asthma Use recreational drug within 21 day prior experiment day Visit altitude > 1500m within 4 week prior experiment Air travel flight time 3 hour within 4 week prior experiment History acute mountain sickness Recent hospital admission surgery general anaesthesia ( < 3 month ) Claustrophobia Feelings discomfort 10 minute test wear transparent respiratory helmet screen visit
